description: The Silver Searcher is a text search tool like grep or ack, except faster. It's written in super-optimized C (like grep) and it's intelligent about entirely skipping files that you don't want to waste time searching (like ack).
summary: The Silver Searcher is like grep or ack, except faster.
author: Geoff Greer,  Krzysztof Kowalczyk,  Jean-François Larvoire
